SEARCH
Module com.example.samplesalad
Package com.example.samplesalad.model

Class DrumKit

java.lang.Object
com.example.samplesalad.model.DrumKit
public class DrumKit extends Object
The DrumKit class represents a collection of pads, each of which can be assigned a Sample. It provides methods to add pads, load a kit with samples, save the kit, and manage individual pads.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DrumKit(String kitName)
    Constructs a DrumKit with a specified name and number of pads.

    • saveKit

      public void saveKit(String filePath)
      Saves the current drum kit state to a file. The implementation of saving can vary (e.g., JSON or XML format).
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path where the drum kit should be saved.

    • getPad

      public Pad getPad(int padNumber)
      Returns the pad assigned to a specific pad number.
      Parameters:
      padNumber - The pad number (0-based index).
      Returns:
      The Pad object at the specified pad number.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the pad number is out of range.

    • assignSampleToPad

      public void assignSampleToPad(Sample sample, int padNumber)
      Assigns a sample to a specific pad.
      Parameters:
      sample - The sample to be assigned.
      padNumber - The pad number (0-based index) to which the sample will be assigned.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the pad number is out of range.
